data.text: UK Royal Wedding: Gospel Choir sings "Stand by Me"  Ben E King Original Artist https://t.co/PmI12KmdOS

Everyone Is Talking About That Rendition of "Stand by Me" at the Royal Wedding
https://t.co/ptZIzmVl4R
All and all I wish the newlyweds joy, love and happiness all through their married life. 🙂
BTW Princess Diana WAS at Prince Harry's and Meghan Markles Wedding. Prince Harry knows that, he knew she was there and so was his other grandmother and grandfather. 🙂
Emotional moment Prince Harry tears up when Diana’s favourite hymn was played during Royal Wedding https://t.co/pOYg5dIhaV
However there is one that was missed. Somebody pointed out here on twitter that Princes Harry and Princess Meghan left a seat open which symbolized a seat for Princess Diana. https://t.co/ww6eHPQKZm

said, Well that was A FORCEFUL &UPLIFTING Msg from Bishop Michael. 🙃😄I think the announcer was trying find words of what just took place in Michael Curry's sermon. 😉😎 One of the nicest touches was how Princess Diana was honored &ncl in the Wedding. https://t.co/bjZrIs1qDV

So the Royals and their guests were brought to church in a different way. Now for the Sermon itself, and to each their own, it was a TAD BIT LONG WINDED FOR ME. J/S. I feel that way about all RELIGIOUS SERMONS no matter who delivers them. I had to chuckle when the BBC announcer

when you look around the world at Africans, Black communities how they sing, hymn, praise and dance. The COUNTRY and CULTURAL is there in all demonstrations of CONNECTIONS to their TRUE ROOTS. And this also rings true of other ethnic cultural, what was meant to be lives in you.

ways to Lift their ppls spirits. Further there is a saying you can bring the boy or girl out of the country but you can't take the country out of the boy or girl and this rings very true with the Black and other Minority communities. As an example there is a POWERFUL SIMILARITY

lost. PREACHING the GOSPEL, SINGING is what DISPELLED FEARS and REVIVED HOPE. Black Preachers had to get their communities attention and traditional ways of other ethnic ppl wasn't going to work for Historically TRAUMATIZED ppl in Black communities. Black preachers had to find

BRINGING YOU TO CHURCH and if anyone knows how to pump up the Volume and bring folks to Church Black people around the world know EXACTLY how do to this and it has everything to do with Cultural. If you look at Black history, there were very dark times, were all HOPE could be

were somewhat amused just looking at the expression of some of the the Royals faces, the younger Royals seemed to be more amused on what their elder Royals were thinking. What was going on here. Well this is were Cultural comes in, in Black communities, churchgoing folk call it

So now lets get to the Preacher/Bishop Michael Curry's SERMON. To some this was very different, certainly nothing the Royals ever experienced and I am sure some of them thought they were never experience this type of preaching along with some of their guests. I think some of us

While some are making jest of the Queen not smiling. I think its remarkable that her majesty Queen Elizabeth the II made it all, she is 92 years old after all. How well, will we all do if we should live that long.The Ceremony was modern & unique, emphasizing and honoring CULTURAL

handled very well. She walked down the Isle and was met halfway down where Prince Charles the Duke of Cornwall and Rothesay was a very ELEGANT touch. I hope Meghan Markles dad Thomas Markle as a speedy recovery. Everyone attending the wedding looked quite lovely in their attire.

Princess Meghan the Duchess of Sussex absolutely shined, she borrowed the Tiara from her mother in law Queen Elizabeth II. The Tiara's origin came from Queen Mary and was made in 1932 for Mary. It is an 86 year old Tiara. I thought the absence of Meghan Markles beloved father was

BEAUTIFUL in its SIMPLICITY and the VEIL COMPLIMENTED Meghan Markles Wedding Dress. IMO. That Veil was FABULOUS and GRAND. It DAZZLED and was a GORGEOUS VEIL on a GORGEOUS women.  Meghan Markle looked ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL on her Wedding Day. https://t.co/JPRxzxGYJj

Princess Kate's dress was equally lovely and Kate looked very beautiful in her dress on her wedding day. However if Princess Meghan wore the dresses similar to Princess Diana and Kate, she would have looked lost in it because she is so tiny. The dress the Princess Meghan wore

petite lady and not as tall. Princess Diana would NOT have picked that  wedding dress had she been left to her own devices. Camilla Parker Bowels picked that dress (most of us know the story and how dirty that was) . Princess Diana brought fashion and style to the Royals. IMO.

Cambridge and the Duke of Cambridge/Prince William. First of all all three women are/were beautiful women in their OWN RIGHT. Lets get that straight. However, all three women are built differently. Both Princess Diana and Kate are taller then Meghan Markle. Duchess Meghan is a

Ha ha ha, I thought REALLY. First of all, it wasn't anybody else's wedding but the now Duchess of Sussex Meghan Markle and the Duke of Sussex/Prince Harry. Then some ppl were COMPARING Duchess Megahan's dress to her mother in law the late great Princess Diana and  Duchess Kate of

Back to the Wedding Duchess Meghan looked EXQUISITE, she looked so radiant and she looked extremely happy as did Prince/Duke Harry/Henry. Naturally some UGLY HATEFUL ppl wanted to be EXHIBIT their bitter jealousy and said that Meghan's dress wasn't up to their standards. 😬

Its all about rank. A prince or princess is one that is born of royal blood while a Duchess is one that marries royalty. At the end of it all, some of the ppl will end up calling Meghan Princess like they do with Kate and even with Princess Diana after her marriage to Charles.
